transArray.content: The location is so convenient, 20 minutes drive from Capital Airport. The indoor subway is also very convenient, it takes two or three minutes to get there from the subway exit. Although the room is small, it has everything, it is convenient, and the quality of supplies is also very good. In Beijing, it is worthy of the location and price. There is also a free supper at night, which is also delicious. Next time I go to live here
